title: random and frequent FPS drop (Windows user)
body:
any Window users here having FPS drops too after the 6.6 update? Here are my specs:

i5 3570k
GTX-660TI
8gb RAM
Win 10.

Any Solution would be great thanks!

replies.body: The usual cause of FPS issues we see are issues with hardware or graphics drivers.  As a first step, I'd suggest following the steps in our [FPS Troubleshooting article](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-troubleshooting).  Should give a good place to start so we can help find a solution.
